item.description:
[b]"THE LARGEST & BEST SINGLES ACTIVITIES ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND."

SATURDAY, OCTOBER 16, at RADISSON HOTEL, 180 Water St., Plymouth. (508)747-4900. www.radisson.com/plymouth.
Dancing with music by award-winning DJ from 8:30-12:00 AM.
Complimentary buffet all night, free door prizes, and MATCH GAME prizes.
www.se-4u.com.
FREE MAMBO DANCE LESSONS 7:30-8:30 pm.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES and couples, 35-65 years old.
Cost is $13 ALL NIGHT.
Proper business dress is required for men; sports jacket or dress shirt & tie at minimum; business or party finery for women. DRESS TO IMPRESS.
Info, call (781)446-0234.
Co-sponsored by Rhode Islandâ€™s Most Eligible Singles.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Pam at the door.
item.name: "SINGLES WITH STYLE" SINGLES DANCE
